fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
You and the first person to say "I enter the GIUno bunker" are immune to any negative effects from the next <:holy:1120560132150022184>, <:hyrulean:1119825670864916551>, or <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> card played.
- After a card with the above colors is played, this effect disappears.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:lightgray:1120572654760505344> + <:cyan:1106716163184009277> ):
fields.value:
You are permanently immune to any negative effects from <:holy:1120560132150022184>, <:hyrulean:1119825670864916551>, and <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> cards.
- The only way you can lose your immunity is if you say "I leave my precious warbunker." in the game chat.
